title: BOC reject a major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a selection transaction has been submitted to the BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user opens up transaction
AND clicks Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction is rejected
AND a notification is sent to the Club whom the player belongs

title: BOC user reverses a major league roster transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a selection transaction has been approved
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user opens up the selection transaction 
AND clicks reverse
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status becomes Reversed
AND displays as "Voided" on the player's player history

title: Submit an outright to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is creating an outright transaction for a player 
AND is ready to submit it to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN successful submit message appears
AND transaction appears in green on players player history

title: BOC user approves major/minor outright transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an outright has been submitted
AND a BOC user logs in
custom_steps:
WHEN outright is opened
AND user clicks 'Approve'
custom_expected:
THEN a successful blue notification will be displayed
AND players minor league status will be set to Active
AND players ML status will be set to Null
AND players prior outright flag will be set 
AND players destination club will be set

title: User can submit an optional assignment to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am creating an optional assignment for a player
custom_steps: WHEN submitting the optional assignment
custom_expected:
THEN status updates to “Submitted to BOC”
AND system creates an entry in Players History: Code = OPTAS, Description = Optional Assignment

title: BOC user can approve an optional assignment tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN there is an Optional Assignment whose status is “Submitted to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN clicking “Approve” will run all required field, formatting, On Submit and On Approve rules checks and display any relevant error or warning messages.
AND Update the player’s Player History: : Code = OPTAS, Description = Optional Assignment

title: User can submit a Recall tx to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Club user
AND has completed a Recall tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the form will change to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the tx in view mode
AND a blue notification will appear

title: BOC user can approve a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Recall tx with a status “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to “Approved”
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the Player’s Player History updates: Code = RECOP, Description = ”Recall” or “Recall- Not to report” [show this for transactions with Not to Report checkbox activated], From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.

title: BOC user can reverse a Recall tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Recall tx with a status of “Approved”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reverse”
custom_expected:
THEN a successful revers notification will be displayed
AND the tx status is updated to “Reversed”
AND player's major and minor roster statuses are reverted to what they were prior to the transaction approval
AND player's Club is set back to what it was prior to the transaction approval

title: User can submit a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Club user
AND has completed a Transfer of Option tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit to BOC”
custom_expected:
THEN the status of the form will change to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the tx in view mode
AND a blue notification will appear

title: BOC user can reject a Transfer of Option tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a Transfer of Option tx with a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reject”
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to “Rejected”
AND Successful reject notification is displayed

title: BOC user can approve a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a Designate for release or assignment tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN  the status will update to "Approved"
AND a successful blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's Player History: Code = DFA, Description = Designated for Release or Assignment, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to Designated for Assignment
AND set the player's MN Roster Status to null

title: BOC user can reject a designate for release or assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a Designate for release or assignment tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Rejected"
AND a successful reject notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, Pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry

title: Submit an elect free agency to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an "Elect Free Agency" Transaction has been created
AND "Elect under Article" is set to XXD or another option that is available to clubs
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the system will set the player's pending Org and Club to NULL
AND the system will set the player's pending Major League Rosters status to "Free Agent"

title: BOC user can approve an elect free agency transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Elect Free Agency" tx 
AND is in view or edit mode in a state of Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status is updated to "Approved"
AND a blue notification is displayed
AND the item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND the player's MJR or MNR status is set to Free Agent
AND the player's Org and Club is set to Null

title: BOC user, approving an elect free agency tx to expire a player's minor league contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver
AND an elect free agency tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking approve
custom_expected:
THEN the players current minor league contract will expire
AND Player's minor contract status updates to 'Expired'. 
AND Contract Status on contract will say "Expired". 
AND Automatic comment generated on the contract. "Expired by [username] on [date, time stamp] via [transaction name - article name]"

title: BOC user can approve a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a Sign to Major League Roster tx
AND the tx is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Approve
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to Approved
AND a blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed form the Approvals Clipboard
AND the player's Player History will update Code = SGNFA, Description = Sign Free Agent to Major League Roster, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to black font
AND set the player's MJ Roster Status to to “Active Pending Contract”. 
BUt if this transaction is auto-created, set MJ Roster status to “Active”
ANd set the player's MN Roster Status to null.
AND set the player's Org and Club to the Signing Org

title: BOC user can reverse and a sign to major league roster transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC user
AND there is a sign to major league roster tx in an Approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN a reverse notification will display
AND the tx status will update to "Reversed"
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses and level of play will update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved

title: Submit a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN an "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" Transaction has been created
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN the tx status will update to "Submitted to BOC"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the system will set the player's pending Org and Club to NULL
AND the system will set the player's pending Major League Rosters status to "Free Agent"

title: BOC user can reject a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an "Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)" tx 
AND is in a state, Submitted to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN clicking Reject
custom_expected:
THEN the status will update to "Rejected"
AND a blue notification will display
AND the item will be removed from the approvals clipboard
AND reverse player's Pending org and club, pending MJ Roster Status and Pending MN Roster Status
AND remove pending player history entry.

title: User can print Notice of Disposition for an Appointment of 26th Man tx
User can print Notice of Disposition for a Recall tx
User can print Notice of Disposition for Optional Assignment tx
User can print Notice of Disposition for a Major/Minor Outright tx
Receive error transferring player level "1A" and has 6 or more years of MN service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in 
AND has selected a Minor League player that has 6 or more years of Service
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates a new Transfer tx for player
AND transfers him to a level 1A club
AND clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user receives error "Player may exceed service restrictions in MLR 51"
AND can Ignore & Override the message
OR click Back

title: Receive error Outrighting player to level "R" and has 3 or more years of MN service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in 
AND has selected a Minor League player that has 3 or more years of Service
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates a new MJ/MN Outright for player
AND outrights him to a level R club
AND clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user receives error "Player exceeds service restrictions. See MLR 51. Contact BOC to submit transaction."
AND ONLY the BOC can Ignore & Override the message, Clubs will see a blocker

title: Create New Rule 6 Return Process tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Create New>Major Transactions>Assignments>Rule 6 Return Process
custom_expected:
THEN IF no preliminary, submitted or rejected transaction created within 10 days of the current date exists, the system will load a new Preliminary transaction
AND The Text on the form is dynamic and should be updated when the user adjusts the tender date and time displayed

title: View existing Rejected Return of Rule 5 Selection tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Club has initiated a Rule 6 Return Process with a Rule 5 selected player
AND Club has submitted this transaction
AND the transaction is rejected
AND a Return of Rule 5 Selection tx is auto-created
custom_steps: WHEN user advance searches for the Return of Rule 5 Selection
custom_expected: THEN user can select and view tx
